column1: # Example samplesheet for uSeq2Tracks Nextflow pipeline
# - sample_id: Unique identifier for the sample
# - sra_id: SRA accession (leave empty if using local files)
# - read1: Path to R1 FASTQ file (leave empty if using SRA)
# - read2: Path to R2 FASTQ file (leave empty if using SRA or single-end)
# - experiment_group: Experiment identifier for grouping samples
